item.title: Building this site
item.description: Introduction This post is about how I set up this site! Framework So I wanted a static site generator. You know, the trendy, ‘lightning fast’ modern-web-has-gone-full-circle technology. Because I just want to write some text that people can read, and I can execute a build step without hurting myself. Perfect is the enemy of good Being the kind of person who often lets perfect get the better of me, I didn’t want to get stuck at step one this time.
